FuncDef: The reset l2tp statistics lac tunnel-item command clears statistics about LAC protocol packets based on a tunnel ID.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a tunnel ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 65535.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To reset statistics about LAC protocol packets based on a tunnel ID, run the reset l2tp statistics lac tunnel-item command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only on the admin VS.
